ApexTestResultLimits.name: ApexTestResultLimits
ApexTestResultLimits.description: Captures the Apex test limits used for a particular test method execution. An instance of this object is associated with each ApexTestResult object.

ApexTestResultId.description: The ID of the associated ApexTestResult object.

AsyncCalls.description: The number of asynchronous calls made during the test run.

Callouts.description: The number of callouts made during the test run.

Cpu.description: The amount of CPU used during the test run, in milliseconds.

Dml.description: The number of DML statements made during the test run.

DmlRows.description: The number of rows accessed by DML statements during the test run.

Email.description: The number of email invocations made during the test run.

LimitContext.description: Indicates whether the test run was synchronous or asynchronous.

LimitExceptions.description: Indicates whether your org has any limits that differ from the default limits.

MobilePush.description: The number of mobile push calls made during the test run.

QueryRows.description: The number of rows queried during the test run.

Soql.description: The number of SOQL queries made during the test run.

Sosl.description: The number of SOSL queries made during the test run.
